pma:database.name: db_securityagency
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `address` ( `Address_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `Street` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `Barangay` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `City` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `Province` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `Postal_Code` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Address_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=103 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `assignment` ( `Assignment_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `Personnel_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `Contract_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `AssignmentStart` date DEFAULT NULL, `AssignmentEnd` date DEFAULT NULL, `Status_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `Salary_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Assignment_ID`), KEY `Personnel_ID` (`Personnel_ID`), KEY `Contract_ID` (`Contract_ID`), KEY `Status_ID` (`Status_ID`), KEY `fk_assignment_salary` (`Salary_ID`), CONSTRAINT `assignment_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`Personnel_ID`) REFERENCES `personnel` (`Personnel_ID`), CONSTRAINT `assignment_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`Contract_ID`) REFERENCES `contract` (`Contract_ID`), CONSTRAINT `assignment_ibfk_3` FOREIGN KEY (`Status_ID`) REFERENCES `status` (`Status_ID`), CONSTRAINT `fk_assignment_salary` FOREIGN KEY (`Salary_ID`) REFERENCES `salary` (`Salary_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `client` ( `Client_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `ClientName` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `ClientType_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `Address_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `ContactPerson` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `ContactNumber` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `Email` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Client_ID`), KEY `ClientType_ID` (`ClientType_ID`), KEY `Address_ID` (`Address_ID`), CONSTRAINT `client_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`ClientType_ID`) REFERENCES `clienttype` (`ClientType_ID`), CONSTRAINT `client_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`Address_ID`) REFERENCES `address` (`Address_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `contract` ( `Contract_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `Client_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `StartDate` date DEFAULT NULL, `EndDate` date DEFAULT NULL, `PaymentType_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `Status_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `ContractValue` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Contract_ID`), KEY `Client_ID` (`Client_ID`), KEY `PaymentType_ID` (`PaymentType_ID`), KEY `Status_ID` (`Status_ID`), CONSTRAINT `contract_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`Client_ID`) REFERENCES `client` (`Client_ID`), CONSTRAINT `contract_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`PaymentType_ID`) REFERENCES `paymenttype` (`PaymentType_ID`), CONSTRAINT `contract_ibfk_3` FOREIGN KEY (`Status_ID`) REFERENCES `status` (`Status_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `grosssalary` ( `Salary_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `GrossType_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `Amount` float DEFAULT NULL, KEY `GrossType_ID` (`GrossType_ID`), KEY `Salary_ID` (`Salary_ID`), CONSTRAINT `grosssalary_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`GrossType_ID`) REFERENCES `grosstype` (`GrossType_ID`), CONSTRAINT `grosssalary_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`Salary_ID`) REFERENCES `salary` (`Salary_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `payrollperiod` ( `Pay_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `Date_Start` date DEFAULT NULL, `Date_End` date DEFAULT NULL, `Personnel_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Pay_ID`), KEY `Personnel_ID` (`Personnel_ID`), CONSTRAINT `payrollperiod_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`Personnel_ID`) REFERENCES `personnel` (`Personnel_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `personnel` ( `Personnel_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `Personnel_Name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `Personnel_Age` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `CivilStatus_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `Gender_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `Address_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `ContactNo` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `Email` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `Assignment_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Personnel_ID`), KEY `CivilStatus_ID` (`CivilStatus_ID`), KEY `Gender_ID` (`Gender_ID`), KEY `Address_ID` (`Address_ID`), KEY `fk_personnel_assignment` (`Assignment_ID`), CONSTRAINT `fk_personnel_assignment` FOREIGN KEY (`Assignment_ID`) REFERENCES `assignment` (`Assignment_ID`), CONSTRAINT `personnel_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`CivilStatus_ID`) REFERENCES `civilstatus` (`CivilStatus_ID`), CONSTRAINT `personnel_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`Gender_ID`) REFERENCES `gender` (`Gender_ID`), CONSTRAINT `personnel_ibfk_3` FOREIGN KEY (`Address_ID`) REFERENCES `address` (`Address_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `personnel_deductions` ( `Deduct_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `Personnel_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `Deduction_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `AccountNo` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `Contribution_Amount` float DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Deduct_ID`), KEY `Personnel_ID` (`Personnel_ID`), KEY `Deduction_ID` (`Deduction_ID`), CONSTRAINT `personnel_deductions_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`Personnel_ID`) REFERENCES `personnel` (`Personnel_ID`), CONSTRAINT `personnel_deductions_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`Deduction_ID`) REFERENCES `deductions` (`Deduction_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `salary` ( `Salary_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `Pay_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `Personnel_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `Total_Deductions` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `Total_Gross` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `NetGross` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`Salary_ID`), KEY `Pay_ID` (`Pay_ID`), KEY `Personnel_ID` (`Personnel_ID`), CONSTRAINT `salary_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`Pay_ID`) REFERENCES `payrollperiod` (`Pay_ID`), CONSTRAINT `salary_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`Personnel_ID`) REFERENCES `personnel` (`Personnel_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `salarydeductions` ( `Salary_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `Deduct_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `Amount` float DEFAULT NULL, KEY `Salary_ID` (`Salary_ID`), KEY `Deduct_ID` (`Deduct_ID`), CONSTRAINT `salarydeductions_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`Salary_ID`) REFERENCES `salary` (`Salary_ID`), CONSTRAINT `salarydeductions_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`Deduct_ID`) REFERENCES `personnel_deductions` (`Deduct_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;
